title: Tasty family chilli
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 medium onions, roughly chopped', '1 medium red pepper, chopped', '1 stick celery, roughly sliced (optional)', '500g minced beef', '2 to 3 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon mild chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 teaspoons sea salt', '1 (390g) tin chopped tomatoes', '4 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '200ml beef stock', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans']
